availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Sumner County, Tennessee, soldier. Tennessee native. Son of George Ramsey and Anna Ramsey. Resident of Sumner County, Tennessee, in 1850. Mustered in as a private in the 2nd Battalion (Biffle's) Tennessee Cavalry (C.S.A.) on September 27, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Sumner County, District 15, p. 192B.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers Who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 0010.
